attributes.action: Make a plant based diet a recommended alternative for managing health issues.
attributes.background: When patients with self manageable conditions such as type 2 diabetes and high cholesterol visit health professionals with intent on reducing their health problems, a plant based diet should be recommended as part of a plan to become healthier. This in turn may save more lives and cut spending.

rejection.details:
It's up to doctors to decide what actions to recommend to their patients in individual cases, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to promote the benefits of a plant-based diet, if that's what you'd like to happen.
